data.text: @PauloEastvan @KvncrwDoug Incidentally, much of the Rothschild (and other western-democracy destabilizing) rumour mongering surrounding #MH370 was led by Russian or Russia-aligned propaganda houses. I spent far too much time digging into the details back then; it was the first time I'd really looked deep.

@rwlens @KvncrwDoug Mostly anti semitism. Autocrats also hate him because of his promotion of open societies. Putin, because he helped former iron curtain countries to liberalize.
https://t.co/XY6Y4d7Yu9

@PauloEastvan @KvncrwDoug And it doesn't matter what the issue of the day is, they will find a way to mutter Rothschild, and others. Soros for more than his heritage. From globalism to #MH370 to vaccines to the price of coffee, these truly frightening people see a Jewish conspiracy around every corner.
@PauloEastvan And they comment on each other’s posts like they share viewpoints. Just hating Dr Henry is the point, doesn’t matter if they want more restrictions or none. So crazy.
@rwlens @KvncrwDoug A common thread among conspiracy theorists unfortunately..,
@KvncrwDoug @PauloEastvan There's a good dose of anti-semitism in that clip of tweets.
@KvncrwDoug Once in awhile I’ll see the hastag trending and it’s 9/10 Scotty tweeting the same thing every 5 minutes.
@PauloEastvan A waste of energy trying…Scotty is lucky DBH is not litigious…her lawyers would be busy.
